channel.title: Stalls Money!
channel.description:
:mad: Offtopic: Well ok as i am changing everthing on my server To make it runescape Like i have added ever single skill on 317 (Not summoning Etc) they all work 98%Fine sept from slayer adding stuff! Back ontopic. Ok right ok the stealing stalls how do i change the the money what you get/addeditem 995 15000 like that. i cannot find it anywhere what ever which file i go in i search: [code] additem (995, 15000) [/code]
random code was in my head!
i want to find the place where it would be i think it would be next to the skill add etc.

item.title: Stalls Money!
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

Search for

OBJECT CLICK TWO

You should see something like this:

case 2562: TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve 20k", 60, 250 * playerLevel[17], 995, 20000, 5, 0x340);

that is a thieve stall code. The 2562 is the stallâ€™s object id. The 995, 20000 is the amount of money given for stealing from that stall. So to change the amount of money you get from stealing from a stall search for

case "stallId":

Then change the number after 995 to whatever number you want

Read full topic
